metadata.title: CVE-2022-37290 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GNOME Nautilus 42.2 allows a NULL pointer dereference and get_basenameapplication crash via a pasted ZIP archive.

criterions.comment: nautilus: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
nemo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
caja: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
